sense.def:
To attribute something to an event or situation
pomeni, da mislimo, da je vzrok za tako stanje tisti dogodek ali položaj.

seg.quote: Economists attributed the lack of progress to poor cooperation.

sense.def:
To attribute a remark, a piece of writing, or a work to someone
pomeni povedati, da je nekdo tisto pripombo, besedilo ali umetnino izrekel, napisal ali izdelal.

To attribute a particular quality or feature to someone or something
pomeni misliti, da ima tisti človek ali stvar določeno lastnost ali značilnost.

seg.quote: Here we are attributing human feelings to animals.
...the attribution of mysterious powers to these men.

sense.def:
An attribute
je značilnost ali oznaka.
